channel.title: shell on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe
channel.description: Recent content in shell on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: alias
item.description: These are the dotfiles that configure my shell, currently I’m using bash. These files are sourced into ~/.bashrc: shell/prompt prompt style and command shell/func small homebrew and borrowed functions shell/alias alias file shell/path directories in $PATH shell/misc other options and settings env/export Environment variables I also keep some settings in shell/inputrc, mostly keybindings and VI-mode options.
